title: Women from National Negro Opera Company dance corps, for "La Traviata" performance, including Lois Weaver (Watson), Agnes Norvell, and Rosemarie Lawrence seated on floor, Louise Wray, Marilyn Ware, and Delores Allen seated on floor in second row, Patricia Ware, Eunice Walker, Dora Noakes, and Mary Bolden kneeling and bending in third row, and Libby Barron, two unknowns, Pearl Moore, two unknowns, Doris Clark (Moody), unknown, and Suzanne Walker standing in back row, posed in Centre Avenue YWCA
medium: black and white: Agfa super pan press Film
provenance_text: The Estate of Charles H. Harris, Pittsburgh
